definition: Cross-streets in which a particular sewer is installed
Drainage area feature class that is a copy of the data within the Small_Sewer_Drainage_Areas feature class for a given Project_ID.
Identifying code given to a particular set of studied sewers. This almost always should correspond to the work numbers assigned by LAMP or other.
Unique identifier for a study area within a given project
Length of sewer for which a given study area is focused upon
Set of sewers in a given study area that represents the longest flow path upstream of the study sewer
